alert.note: Alert for Billings; Golden Valley (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 8:46PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF GOLDEN VALLEY AND WESTERN BILLINGS COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM MDT... At 745 PM MDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles south of Trotters to 10 miles southeast of Sentinel Butte. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Medora, Sentinel Butte, Trotters, Sentinel Butte State Nature Preserve, Sully Creek State Park, and Elkhorn State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
